divs: sighting detailslast evening 4\23\08 at 10:15pm i was eating dinner outside at ricks boatyard cafe located at eagle creek lake on the nw side of indianapolis located in marion county. most of the people were gone as we sat on the restaurants outdoor patio with my wife and two other friends finishing up our dinner conversation. my seat was facing north at the table when i noticed a bright light in the northern sky. we are close to a local airport and also the indianapolis international airport and love to watch planes as we sail around on the lake. i thought it was a plane coming in for landing. i then noticed another bright light appear very close in fact what looked like too close for two planes to be on an evening approach. suddenly the lights disappeared, i said nothing to my wife or guests and kept looking in the same direction. then they reappeared again first one light then two with a third light appearing just to the east, i told my wife and guests to look into the sky and tell me if they are seeing what i am seeing. we watched as the lights disappeared and i told them to keep watching and that they might reappear. we watched and sure enough they did reappear only this time there were 4 of them coming on one at a time. the two central lights appeared again and in the same location as before, then the eastern or port side light came on then the western or starboard side light came on forming what looked like a very large triangle shape. if i were to guess distance i would say about a mile across from the port to starboard light. we heard no noise, and the lights did not appear to be moving only coming on and going off. after they went out this time they did not reappear but we all had a fun time watching and trying to figure out what it could be? weather conditions were good, skies were clear at this time of night with many stars visible and in sight.
